title: 6Pcs Woodless Pencil Set Black Woodless Graphite Pencils HB, 2B, 4B, 6B, 8B and EE, Drawing Pencils for Sketching, Drawing and Shading, Gift for Artist, Hobbyist,Beginner
features: 6 grades of graphite included: HB, 2B, 4B, 6B, 8B and EE (EE is 50% graphite and 50% charcoal)
Ideal for sketching, shading and creating broad or fine strokes. Maintains excellent light permanency, producing vibrant, durable pieces of art
High quality graphite,excellent laydown properties for layering and blending without waxy buildup
Sharpen with a regular sharpener, sandpaper block or blade
description: 6pcs graphite pencils, HB 2H 2B 4B 6B 8B, very smooth and not too thick. The woodless pencils have a coating on them, no wood, so you won't get graphite all over your hands. Suitable for kids/children, color from the page will not rub all over their hand, sleeve etc. Deep charcoal color. Compared to regular pencil, the woodless one is angled to create wide lines and make shading easier. Sharpen with a regular sharpener, sandpaper block or blade. The only thing to be careful of is not dropping them - they will shatter. Fine quality charcoal pencils set gift for practice sketches, students or hobbyists.
